sub_fields.title: Describe what makes your idea innovative compared to what has been previously launched in the market (whether by you or others).
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
SmarTrust stands out as a user-friendly, self-managed, and cost-effective platform designed to restore trust in the global freelance economy. While competitors rely on slow manual processes, high fees, and narrowly define escrow as only a payment step, SmarTrust delivers protection throughout the full lifecycle of work—starting from contract creation to mediation and adjudication. The root cause of disputes lies in the fact that the contract is not clear to start with.

Our platform combines AI-assisted mediation with human adjudication to resolve disputes faster and more fairly than traditional systems, which favors one side mostly.  With smart-contract-powered escrow, payments are locked in up front (in milestones if so desired) and released instantly once both parties agree, ensuring secure, predictable compensation at highly competitive fees.

The innovation lies in how SmarTrust integrates contract development, automated escrow, and high-quality human adjudication into one seamless solution.  An innovative element is how we incorporate human adjudication in our system, which is something others do not have.  And innovation only becomes true innovation when it is adopted by the market—our own quantitative research confirms strong demand, with over 80% of freelancers wanting exactly this kind of protection and payment assurance.

Where many competitors build marketplaces and treat escrow as an afterthought, SmarTrust delivers escrow-as-a-service specifically.  By focusing on the workflows freelancers actually value, SmarTrust is positioned to define the standard for fair and secure payments in the future of work. 

Our focus is simple: we want to get freelancers to get paid!

sub_fields.title: Describe what your prototype or MVP will demonstrate, and where it can be accessed.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
The MVP will demonstrate how to generate a contract that both parties can agree to, develop the smart contract, fund the smart contract or escrow, and disseminate the funds to the freelancer once the work has been agreed upon by both parties. 



In addition to this workflow, the freelancer and the buyer will be able to see the tasks that are pending for each party, the invite link, the overview, and overall earnings. They will be able to request adjudication in case of dispute, and an adjudicator will be able to issue a ruling with a split of how much to pay the seller versus how much to refund the buyer.



The MVP will be available on [https://prototype\.cardano\.smartrust\.me](https://prototype.cardano.smartrust.me)

sub_fields.title: Describe realistic measures of success, ideally with on-chain metrics.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
Success will be measured by the:

- Number of transactions per month
- Number of freelancers using the service
- Value released to freelancers without adjudication vs. total value committed into escrow
- Speed from adjudication requested to be completed
- Revenue generated from the escrow transactions
- The number of partnerships SmarTrust has with other websites

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
We are creating a user-friendly platform that facilitates agreement authoring, milestone-based service delivery and secure and timely payments for freelancers.  

- An AI model helps author an agreement with clarity on what will be delivered, and in what sequence (milestones)
- Buyer and seller can request how much they want to know about each other, and get KYCd
- Funds are locked in an Escrow powered by Aiken Smart Contracts at the start of a project, and can be topped up in case of scope expansion etc.
- An in-platform chat feature provides opportunity for the parties to chat with each other, an AI advisor, an AI mediator and/or a human adjudicator for fast issue resolutions.
- Services are delivered, reviewed and approved inside the platform.
- Funds are automatically released once the services have been delivered by the freelancer and approved by the buyer.



This ensures fast, predictable cash flow while reducing the risk of non-payment, wasted time, and the frustration of chasing clients or dealing with courts.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
Any Cardanao users can use SmarTrust to engage in freelance work so they can get paid. They can be paid in ADA or Stablecoins, and can freelance around the world if so desired. Remember that freelancing is for a fee not free. 





SmarTrust provides the following benefits to Cardano:

- Increases the utility of ADA and stablecoin adoption on Cardano.
- Positions Cardano as a chain you can go to for secure service delivery
- Shows the power of combining AI with blockchain tech for increased utility and novel user cases.
- Opens a new global freelancing / nomading without having to rely on banks
- Strengthens the use case for on-chain identity solutions, driving adoption of real humans using Cardano: buyers, service providers and adjudicators alike.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
SmarTrust is funded by two senior entrepreneurs with complementary skill sets and a proven track record: A CEO with deep experience in strategic foresight, user research, and teaching business and entrepreneurship at the university level. Our CTO has 25 years of experience as an IT strategist to Fortune 500s plus 5 years of experience building web3 apps with a web2 look and feel. We have a team of developers hired and actively working on building our MVP.





To date, we have over one hundred users on our waitlist. We also have over 100 responses to our survey, indicating a strong need for a platform such as SmarTrust. We are continually engaging in user testing of individual features as they are developed, before integrating them into the MVP (see [https://www\.smartrust\.me/demo](https://www.smartrust.me/demo) for examples). To further prove our MVP we ask a set of trusted alpha testers to regularly test any new features released on the MVP, and engage in focused interview sessions with them to gain insights and improvement suggestions.





Once launched we plan on tracking and analyzing user behaviour on the site, run continuous A/B testing, and we also plan on offering a referral campaign as well as measuring net promoter score, churn and other metrics.

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
This project creates Cardano’s first standardized, reusable escrow framework in Aiken — a tool the ecosystem has needed for years. Instead of every team reinventing fragile payment logic, SmarTrust provides a single, secure, open-source foundation for agreements, payouts, disputes, and accountability.

Because it is chain-native and deterministic, SmarTrust also becomes an ideal fit for Project Catalyst itself. After a proposal is approved, it can be registered as a smart-contracted agreement: Catalyst funds the first milestone, the freelancer delivers, and Catalyst either approves or requests revisions. Once both sides agree, ADA releases automatically. If milestones are missed or work is abandoned, the contract expires and remaining funds return safely to Catalyst. All steps are transparent, predictable, and tamper-proof.

If disagreements arise, Catalyst can assign its own adjudication team within the system. This ensures fairness while avoiding centralized bottlenecks. It also gives Catalyst a verifiable, auditable trail of work completed, funds released, disputes raised, and outcomes ruled.

Beyond Catalyst, this MVP provides value to the ecosystem as a standalone platform which delivers:

A canonical Aiken escrow template that any marketplace or dApp can reuse.





A clean TS SDK, local simulation tools, and examples that reduce developer onboarding time across the ecosystem.





A clear demonstration of why Cardano’s eUTXO model is ideal for multi-party economic coordination.





A high-quality reference codebase, accelerating Aiken adoption and eliminating months of duplicated engineering across projects.





For 70k ADA, the ecosystem receives a public good along with a hosted platform with real utility for real-world use cases : secure infrastructure that powers real economic activity, strengthens dApp reliability, and creates a practical payment and accountability tool for Catalyst itself.
